      • setSource

        public void setSource(int idx)
        Sets and plays the source specified by playlist index (0 based).

        Indexes greater than the size of the playlist will wrap.

        Parameters:
        idx - the index of the source in the playlist

      • setSource

        public void setSource(int idx,
                      boolean play)
        Set the source by index (0 based). Indexes greater than the size of the playlist will wrap.

        Only available from version 2.1.144 on.

        Parameters:
        idx - the index of the source in the playlist
        play - set false to only set current index and not start playback

      • setSource

        public void setSource(Source source)
        Sets and plays the specified Source in the playlist.
        Parameters:
        source - the source

      • setSource

        public void setSource(Source source,
                      boolean play)
        Sets the current source.

        Only available from version 2.1.144 on.

        Parameters:
        source - the new source
        play - set false to only set current source and not start playback

      • getTransitionDuration

        public int getTransitionDuration()
        Get the duration in milliseconds for source transitions
        Returns:
        transition time in milliseconds

      • setTransitionDuration

        public void setTransitionDuration(int duration)
        Sets the duration in milliseconds for source transitions
        Parameters:
        duration - transition time in milliseconds
